name: Add new Instagram media posts to Google Sheets
description: Effortlessly track your Instagram media performance by automatically logging new posts into Google Sheets. With this template, every time you publish new content on your Instagram Business account, Make will create a new row in your Google Sheets, allowing you to analyze engagement metrics and streamline your social media strategy. This integration ensures you never miss a detail about your media performance, making it easier to optimize your content and grow your audience.
